Viper League · Kyle Jackson Design
Viper League

During my six week internship at Youi.TV, myself along with 2 other interns built a TV app using the Youi's Engine One. I focused on designing the motion elements of the app. The video featured above shows a user interacting with the app on a TV, showcasing some of the main features and screens of the app.
